name: Blaze Accelerator Reload
text: This card's name becomes "Tri-Blaze Accelerator" while in the Spell & Trap Zone. During the Main Phase: You can send 1 "Volcanic" card from your hand to the GY, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Blaze Accelerator Reload" once per turn. During the Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; send 1 "Volcanic" card from your Deck to the GY.
